name: Multi-Layer Pattern
solution:
Each layer consisting of sub-modules
can be independently designed to feed into foreign prototypes. Each layer has an input and corresponding output to the succeeding layer. The succeeding return is used as a feed to
the next layers for further processing. Every layer communicates only with its direct neighbor
consequences:
enables inference of results at the individual steps.
Extra components can be added or modified to meet the computational requirements giving it high flexibility
